channel.title: CVE Feed for WPEverest -- Everest Forms – Build Contact Forms, Surveys, Polls, Application Forms, and more with Ease!
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPEverest -- Everest Forms – Build Contact Forms, Surveys, Polls, Application Forms, and more with Ease!

item.title: CVE-2023-51695|2024-08-02T22:40:34.224Z -- wpeverest -- everest%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20build%20contact%20forms%2C%20surveys%2C%20polls%2C%20application%20forms%2C%20and%20more%20with%20ease%21
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPEverest Everest Forms – Build Contact Forms, Surveys, Polls, Application Forms, and more with Ease! allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Everest Forms – Build Contact Forms, Surveys, Polls, Application Forms, and more with Ease!: from n/a through 2.0.4.1.
